title: Electricity crisis will be sorted - President
content: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa assures PUCSL and the general public that all necessary actions will be taken immediately to avert electricity crisis prevailing in the country.The Treasury and the Central Bank will facilitate import of fuel for generation of electricity with immediate effect says Janaka Ratnayakethe Chairman of PUCSL.Secretary to the Ministry of Energy K.D.R. Olga states that the ship carrying 37,300 metric tons of diesel that arrived in Colombo will be cleared today after making the payment in the required US dollars.
